header: God Commands That Babylon Be Taken

verse: The [mournful, inspired] oracle (a burden to be carried) concerning the Desert of the Sea (the seasonally flooded plains just south of Babylon):
This is what the Lord says to me,
And the lookout called like a lion,
The [mournful, inspired] oracle (a burden to be carried) concerning Dumah (Edom):
The [mournful, inspired] oracle (a burden to be carried) concerning Arabia:
For the Lord has said this to me, “Within a year, according to the years of a hired man [who will work no longer than was agreed], all the splendor of [the tribe of] Kedar will end;
and the remainder of the number of archers, the mighty men of the sons of Kedar, will be few; for the Lord, the God of Israel, has spoken.”
